title: Age is not the only risk for severe coronavirus disease - KKTV 11 News
description: Older people remain most at risk of dying as the new coronavirus continues its rampage around the globe, but they’re far from the only ones vulnerable.
content: WASHINGTON AP Older people remain most at risk of dying as the new coronavirus continues its rampage around the globe but theyre far from the only ones vulnerable One of many mysteries Men seem to be faring worse than women And as cases skyrocket in th chars
